trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around February 11th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg) was told lookup when my son was screaming look look,we all saw a spactcular sight of at last 30 star like dot's moving like allthe stars were moving south west ,then i noticed they started to grather in a v shape and moved out at a rate of speed faster than light and disaperd the dot's steched into oval's in this v formation two more group's of 30 or more followed , and exited a few degree's more to the south .the v formation 's was aprox 100,000 feet up and five miles across.clear sky's , it lasted 45seconds ,a few seconds later i called 911 to report and was refered to the f.a.a. after that i went to a friend's house that work's at n.a.s.a. and told that person what just happened and that person said they saw the samething 40 years ago back east.three of us saw this great event. when i saw this at first i could not belive what i was seeing and then i knew what it was and thought we could be in trouble this was the real starwar's **(wit's initials deleted--cms\sg).
Summary: looking up in the sky noticed aprox 30 in the first group, two more group's
